Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Philip Apruzzese
Summary: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Philip Apruzzese.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to granting retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Philip Apruzzese
